TextView.android:text: Voice Input is referred to receive continuous input from the user and match with a certain phrase, that certain phrase will be provided manually auto saved by the system .We highly recommend you to use our triggerphrase function to save a certain phrase,when you will go to that option it will show you the earlier saved phrases,you can change the phrase according to your desire but we recommend you to use a rare and uncommon phrase.Our app continuously runs in the background.
